mapper.select: SELECT c.CHARACTER_ID, c.USER_ID, c.CHARACTER_NAME, c.IMAGE_ID, i.IMAGE_URL, c.CHARACTER_PERSONALITY_ID, c.BACKGROUND_INFO, c.GRADE_ID, c.TOTAL_STAGE_CLEARS, c.EVOLUTION_STEP, s.CHARACTER_HP, s.CHARACTER_ATTACK, s.CHARACTER_DEFENSE, s.CHARACTER_SPEED, s.CRITICAL_RATE FROM TB_CHARACTER c LEFT JOIN TB_CHARACTER_STAT s ON c.CHARACTER_ID = s.CHARACTER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON c.IMAGE_ID = i.IMAGE_ID WHERE c.CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId}

SELECT c.CHARACTER_ID, c.USER_ID, c.CHARACTER_NAME, c.IMAGE_ID, i.IMAGE_URL, c.CHARACTER_PERSONALITY_ID, c.BACKGROUND_INFO, c.GRADE_ID, c.TOTAL_STAGE_CLEARS, c.EVOLUTION_STEP, s.CHARACTER_HP, s.CHARACTER_ATTACK, s.CHARACTER_DEFENSE, s.CHARACTER_SPEED, s.CRITICAL_RATE FROM TB_CHARACTER c LEFT JOIN TB_CHARACTER_STAT s ON c.CHARACTER_ID = s.CHARACTER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON c.IMAGE_ID = i.IMAGE_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHARACTER SET TOTAL_STAGE_CLEARS = TOTAL_STAGE_CLEARS + 1, UPDATED_DATE = NOW() WHERE CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId}
mapper.select: SELECT CHARACTER_PERSONALITY_ID AS characterPersonalityId, PERSONALITY_DESCRIPTION AS personalityDescription, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, CREATED_BY AS createdBy, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy FROM TB_CHARACTER_PERSONALITY WHERE CHARACTER_PERSONALITY_ID = #{personalityId} LIMIT 1

SELECT c.CHARACTER_ID AS id, c.CHARACTER_NAME AS name, i.IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl FROM TB_CHARACTER c LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON c.IMAGE_ID = i.IMAGE_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY c.UPDATED_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_image ( image_original_name, image_url, image_name, image_type, created_by ) VALUES ( #{imageOriginalName}, #{imageUrl}, #{imageName}, #{imageType}, #{createdBy} )

INSERT INTO tb_character ( user_id, character_name, image_id, grade_id, character_personality_id, background_info, evolution_step, total_stage_clears, created_by ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{characterName}, #{imageId}, 1, #{characterPersonalityId}, #{backgroundInfo}, 1, 0, #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_character SET grade_id = #{gradeId}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE character_id = #{characterId}
mapper.select: SELECT GRADE_ID FROM TB_CHARACTER WHERE CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId} LIMIT 1
